EmailTemplate.name: 201808_Americas_AP_ACADC.201809_Americas_Email3_AP_ACADC_LL
EmailTemplate.subject: Limited Inventory – ACADC Upgrade with Aero Precision
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Having a reliable air data computer that accurately provides vital information like altitude, airspeed, and Mach number is critical to any mission. Honeywell has partnered with Honeywell Authorized Distributor, Aero Precision, to offer the F-16 Advanced Central Air Data Computer (ACADC) which is listed in the F-16 IPB TO’s and is currently in production for F-16s. With the ACADC upgrade, you’ll count on:
- Solving known issues with the CADC/UCADC - Significant cost savings - 4x better Mean Time Between Failures (MTBF) - Much more
Plus, with Aero Precision, you can expect efficiency and effectiveness on your order. As a leading provider for the F-16, Aero Precision prides itself in being flexible, reliable and committed to quality. To learn more about this upgrade contact Aero Precision.
PN: 62000030-903 NSN: 6610-01-621-9255
UPGRADE WITH AERO PRECISION <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/AeroPrecision_ACADC_ACADC.html?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=18_ChannelAmericas_D%26S]]>
